hasAttributes.name: createdOn
hasAttributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

hasAttributes.name: createdBy
hasAttributes.description: Shows who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: modifiedOn
hasAttributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

hasAttributes.name: modifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

hasAttributes.name: ownerId
hasAttributes.description: Owner Id

hasAttributes.name: owningUser
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

hasAttributes.name: accountId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier of the account.

hasAttributes.name: accountCategoryCode
hasAttributes.description: Select a category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred.

hasAttributes.name: name
hasAttributes.description: Type the company or business name.

hasAttributes.name: accountNumber
hasAttributes.description: Type an ID number or code for the account to quickly search and identify the account in system views.

hasAttributes.name: revenue
hasAttributes.description: Type the annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: Type additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the company's website.

hasAttributes.name: webSiteUrl
hasAttributes.description: Type the account's website URL to get quick details about the company profile.

hasAttributes.name: EMailAddress1
hasAttributes.description: Type the primary email address for the account.

hasAttributes.name: telephone1
hasAttributes.description: Type the main phone number for this account.

hasAttributes.name: fax
hasAttributes.description: Type the fax number for the account.

hasAttributes.name: stateCode
hasAttributes.description: Shows whether the account is active or inactive. Inactive accounts are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

hasAttributes.name: statusCode
hasAttributes.description: Select the account's status.

hasAttributes.name: address1AddressId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for address 1.

hasAttributes.name: address1AddressTypeCode
hasAttributes.description: Select the address type, such as primary or billing.

hasAttributes.name: address1Name
hasAttributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the customer's address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

hasAttributes.name: address1Line1
hasAttributes.description: Type the first line of the customer's address to help identify the location.

hasAttributes.name: address1City
hasAttributes.description: Type the city for the customer's address to help identify the location.

hasAttributes.name: address1StateOrProvince
hasAttributes.description: Type the state or province of the customer's address.

hasAttributes.name: address1County
hasAttributes.description: Type the county for the customer's address.

hasAttributes.name: address1Country
hasAttributes.description: Type the country or region for the customer's address.

hasAttributes.name: address1PostalCode
hasAttributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the address.

hasAttributes.name: address1Telephone1
hasAttributes.description: Type the primary phone number for the customer's address.

hasAttributes.name: address1Longitude
hasAttributes.description: Type the longitude value for the customer's address, for use in mapping and other applications.

hasAttributes.name: address1ShippingMethodCode
hasAttributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

hasAttributes.name: address1Fax
hasAttributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the customer's address.

hasAttributes.name: address1Composite
hasAttributes.description: Shows the complete address.

hasAttributes.name: exchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
hasAttributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

hasAttributes.name: creditLimitBase
hasAttributes.description: Shows the credit limit converted to the system's default base currency for reporting purposes.

hasAttributes.name: revenueBase
hasAttributes.description: Shows the annual revenue converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

hasAttributes.name: marketCapBase
hasAttributes.description: Shows the market capitalization converted to the system's default base currency.
